name: LiveStreamer For Twitch.tv
short_description:
Please watch the video located on the "LiveStreamer For Twitch.tv Web Site" located at the bottom of this description. 

This GUI is a fully functional Twitch.tv in a nice little app that allows you to utilize LiveStreamer for better performance and maintain your favorites. You can save your favorite streams and easily launch them in one quick motion!

Disclaimer

I do not own Twitch.tv nor do I own LiveStreamer. I created neither and have no rights to either. This is just a GUI to bundle the two together to further utilize these tools. I also do not own the Twitch.tv logo used for the icon.

Also, the language this was written in is AutoIt3 which some anti viruses have deemed malicious. If you have any concerns about a firewall prevention please go to the following link for more information.

http://www.autoitscript.com/forum/topic/34658-are-my-autoit-exes-really-infected/
summary: Use LiveStreamer? Well, now use this GUI with it!
